name: Space Truck
description:
Try to get the distanation on this old rusty spacecraft.

Supports 1-4 local coop multiplayer.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD - move, (space) - action, (esc) - menu

XBox-controller: left stick - move, (A)- action, (start) - menu

PS controller: left stick - move, (x) - action, (start) - menu

Gameplay:

When something breaks, go to it (it should become outlined) and hold action to repair it. You can unhold action and leave it at any moment. When repair line becomes yellow - it means that you made a hotfix. You can leave it with hotfix or wait for complete fix (line becomes green). You can make even better fix if charge brocken machine with bolt that could be crafted on 3d printer. Printer consumes boxes. You already have some, and you also can find some out of board. To get out of board go to button and activate it. To grab a box use action, to charge printer with box - go to printer with box and press action.
